attributes.action: Nominate Volodymyr Zelenskyy for an Honorary Award in the next UK honours list.
attributes.additional_details:
This symbolic gesture demonstrates the immense appreciation and admiration of all UK residents to the selfless man who has become an inspirational and courageous leader. President Zelenskyy will likely refuse - asking not for honours but for humanitarian aid; or with great humility, accepting an honour only in the name of the Ukrainian people.
A man who shoulders the burden and responsibility of defending all those in his sovereign homeland, including UK citizens, deserves this recognition.
attributes.background: Nominate for the unreserved protection and assistance to UK citizens, resident or visiting Ukraine, in the face of hostilities from a unprovoked aggressor; and the unwavering "frontline" defence of hard-won rights and freedoms, so long championed by UK citizens and our allies in peacetime Europe.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
